text: Apologies, my app didn't notify me about your reply. I have currently heard nothing about the work experience but I know the studio is really busy at the moment, I also tried to get experience in the theatre yesterday but I wasn't experience enough so didn't get it, that old catch 22 haha.

I'm currently making a film in uni at the moment, I am revisiting my character designs because I'm still not happy they are giving the film the right mood. :) I can send you some of my work over to have a look at of you like? :)
